"Hello! Anime Fans!"

ANIMATION FANS ALL OVER THE WORLD! GATHER!

I am a 27 seven years old half Hispanic, half Asian guy from South America, I have been watching anime consistently since 2009. In all these years I have watched more than 400 shows (adding up to 3100 hours) and I usually critique them based on facts, general consensus and my own feelings. I like writing code in my free time, and also writing novels (I'm bad at this one tho). I speak English and Spanish, I tried to learn German by myself but I gave up, and now learning Chinese by myself as well. Right now I'm studying to become a Full Stack Web Developer, and this is one of my projects, THANK YOU FOR BEING PART OF IT

Please contact me per Email for any further questions about Animation Fans 2022 info@animationfans.com

Animation Fans Logo Explained

For the logo I just went for two single concepts, minimalism and cuteness. Everyone, or almost everyone, love cute things, so I decided to go for something that was recognizable and cute, thus, I picked a "moe" anime girl to be the face of the site for the time being, also, a modern website/brand needs a modern logo, so I went for a minimalist, simple and easy design, using Montserrat font for it.
